summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and providing for a transfer of responsibilities for implementation of Neighborhood Action Team Seattle and the Neighborhood Crime and Justice Center Project from the Department of Neighborhoods to the Strategic Planning Office in the Executive Department; transferring and retitling one position from a Strategic Advisor 2 - General Government position to a Strategic Advisor 2 and making said position exempt from City civil service laws; and increasing expenditure allowance in the 2001 Budget of the Strategic Planning Office by reappropriation and transfer, all by a two-thirds vote of the City Council.
